original_title: UFC Fight Night 67: Condit vs. Alves
overview: UFC Fight Night 67: Condit vs. Alves was a mixed martial arts event held on May 30, 2015, at the Goiânia Arena in Goiânia, Brazil. The event was headlined by a welterweight bout between former WEC & Interim UFC Welterweight champion Carlos Condit and veteran contender Thiago Alves.
title: UFC Fight Night 67: Condit vs. Alves
